meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>most</kanji> <kanji>superior</kanji> <kanji>treatment</kanji> is another way of saying it's the <vocabulary>most favorable treatment</vocabulary> you've ever received. It's when you get the <vocabulary>warmest reception</vocabulary> out of everyone around you. Like they think you're the president or something. Either way, it's pretty great!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
